meanings.definition: A note at the bottom of a page in a book or document that provides additional information or references.
meanings.sent1: The footnote at the end of the page explained the unfamiliar term.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always check the footnotes for more details.
meanings.sent3: The footnote was like a little bonus fact waiting at the bottom.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was like a valuable footnote in the story of our lives.
meanings.sent5: The footnote stood out like a hidden treasure, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: To add a footnote to a text.
meanings.sent1: She decided to footnote the important quote for clarity.
meanings.sent2: Remember to footnote any borrowed information in your essay.
meanings.sent3: He would often footnote his own thoughts to make them stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to footnote the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist would footnote his paintings with hidden symbols for the keen observer.
